PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03942022-04-26,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Ukraine) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (UKRAINE ) REGULATIONS in order to (1) expand the scope of people who can be listed to include current or former members of the People's Council of the so-called Donetsk People’s Republic and Luhansk People’s Republic; and (2) add 203 individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0087 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
AttachmentsAttachment
